item: This will work out perfectly as 5:star: meal:

beta.warning:
Join to the Morex Beta to test new features before others.

**Warning:** Using any of the beta functions may result in data loss. Things are not guaranted to work and can be changed heavily before full release.

To join the Morex Beta click {main.accept}, to leave click {main.deny}.

settings.multiplayer:
**Multiplayer**
If the setting is turned on, player can't use any commands where they can interact with others. Player also can't be selected in commands by different users. (Turned on by default)

Status:
settings.dev_info:
**Development Informations**
If the setting is turned on, player can see aditional informations in some commands. (Turned off by default)

Status:
settings.notif:
**DM Notifications**
If the setting is turned on, player will get notifications in the DM's about new level etc. (Turned on by default)

Status:
settings.language:
**Language**
This setting allows player to change the language in which bot is displayed.
It is recommended to restart this command after changing this setting.

Status:

description.0000:
Test LOL
Item used to test the shop.
description.0005: Normal Coin which can be found everywhere, but as an item. Who thought that it would be a good idea???
description.0006: Bundle containing a couple of unique items. Reward for buying premium.
description.0008: Common item which can be found while mining and it's part of simple items.
description.0009: Material which can be found in a desert. It can be smelted to create Glass.
description.0010: Currency commonly used in southeastern Erim, but in Cetres Bay it's useless.
description.0011: Essence coming from Green Slime. It doesn't have much value, because unlike other essences it cannot be used to create any potions.
description.0012: Essence coming from Blue Slime. It's not very useful for alchemy, since it can only be used to create potion causing itching.
description.0013: Essence coming from Pink Slime. It's really useful since it is an ingredient of the Health Potion and many other potions.
description.0014: Essence coming from Golden Slime. Really hard to get potion ingredient which increases power of potions causing harm.
description.0015: Essence coming from Morex. Item desired by the strongest of wizards, because it hasn't been researched yet and may have an unknown potential.
description.0016: Mythic sword which, according to legends, was wielded by the creator of the swords, long time before Primordial Slime was discovered.
description.0017: Cheap knock off version of durable sword, which can be bought at shops. Manufacturer recommends not using it for fighting and doesn't take any responsibility for any harm caused by using it improperly.
description.0019: Horn coming from Morex. No one has researched it yet. Despite this some people believe that if you blew into it the Slime army would come to fight on your side.
description.0020: Golden Crown worn by rulers and Golden Slime. No one knows why only this Slime wears human clothing.
description.0021: All test items in one place
description.0022: Easy to find box containing a few basic items and in rare cases Diamonds. Who left them there???
description.0023: This one and only pickaxe is used by humans across whole Erim. For some reason no one sees any advantages of having a better pickaxe or different mining tool.
description.0024: Ore which can be found in the deeper layers of underground. Smelting it doesn't require much effort.
description.0025: Metal which everybody has in their homes. It is used literally everywhere, because of how easy it is to get.
description.0026: Failed weapon made by symberian scientist Prachd Tagkour. It is made from diamond blade and iron handle. The weapon became cursed after condensed Pink Essence was used as the gem and because blade was reinforced with Morex Horn. Tagkour was killed by unknown to this day killer who used that sword.
description.0027: Easy to find material from the Forest. With stone it is used to build almost every building in Semerian Empire.
description.0028: Item present in almost every country. It doesn't have a use except that plants grow in it.
description.0029: It is used to smelt partially challenging resources. It can be mined pretty easily since it can be found just below the earth layer.
description.0030: Weapon wielded by beginning warriors and inexperienced adventurers. Main source of damage isn't the sharpness of the blade, but its weight. If I'm being honest this weapon is just dull.
description.0031: Despite better quality from stone counterpart it isn't much stronger than it. Most popular pick amongst amateur warriors and adventurers.
description.0032: Weapon used by professional warriors and adventurer. Weapon is forged with addition of Iron and Gold.
description.0033: First successful Spellbook made by a human. Its creator Kerim Morex decided to destroy it, because it was too powerful. Despite that one being still owns it.
description.0034: Cursed Spellbook made by wizard, who wanted to be immortal by taking life from different beings. He didn't expect that it would take all of his life.
description.0035: Magic book created by a healer for mages, so they can easily heal during fight. The knowledge on how to create it disappeared with the healer.
description.0037:
"I always wanted to hit something with birthday present. Am I the only one?

I didn't expect that I'd get a Spellbook."
description.0039: "Sword so big and heavy it's hard to hold it. You should use it as the decoration."
description.0041: "Since it is my birthday shouldn't people give me gifts?"
description.0042: Ore which can be easily found in the Desert. Smelting it doesn't require big effort.
description.0043: Metal considered as valuable. It is used to make jewelry and coins. Only Bankers know how to create Golden Coins from this Ingot.
description.0044: Ore which can be found deep in the underground. Smelting it requires medium effort.
description.0045: Crystal with a vast variety of usages. From weapons to jewelry and magic.
description.0046: Box containing items related to mining. It's given to beggars for them to go away.
description.0050: Fruit which can be found in the forest. It's given by mothers to their children since it's their favourite.
description.0051: Crystal which can be found in the Desert. It's really valuable, because of its magic properties. Most of the Desert Kingdom income comes from Ruby export.
description.0052: Potion Regenerating HP during fight. It's fairly weak for it to be legally sold at shops and to save up on production costs.
description.0053: Drops from Desert Scorpions. Their price really dropped after Scorpion plague in after III Royal War.
description.0054: One of a few plants growing on the Desert. Some people tried to take advantage that cactuses prick to create a weapon. They disappeared in unexplained circumstances.
description.0055: Weapon used in many duels and as a decoration. It's forged with addition of Iron.
description.0063: i still don't want to put anything here
description.0065: Map showing current borders of countries in Cetres Bay.
description.0066:
weapon of leader of mermaids or something

that's placeholder.
description.0067: Magic Orb unlocking the access to the Desert. Disappears after it is used.
description.0068: It is created by smelting Sand in the Furnace. It's used to create magic Orbs and glass panes.
description.0069: Contrary to its name it can't be found on the Desert. It can be found somewhere in the Forest. It is used to craft Desert Orb.
description.0076: Crystal which can be found in the Void. No one knows why it's there. No one knows what the Void is. If the Void is empty then why's there a Crystal?
description.0089: Metal Shard coming from Kusel Skarrd's machine. Mom told him that he should give up on his dreams of being machine creator and that he should focus on family shop in the Forest.
description.0091: Coupon which allows you to enter the Mineshaft. Sometimes you can find it in the Treasure in the same Mineshaft. Item owned by miners.
description.0095: Skull made out of gold. Elegant and expensive decoration for Halloween.
description.0096: Normal Skull. They don't pay me enough for me to act like a biologist. I have no idea to what this skull belonged.
description.0097: Popular candy given to kids during Halloween. Wait, what do you mean by I'm too old to go trick or treating??
description.0098: Big orange vegetable, which grows only in October. It's somewhat valuable during every other month.
description.0099:
Pumpkin with carved eyes and mouth with a candle inside. Popular Halloween decoration. Wait a second... Candles don't emit blue light.
Pumpkin possessed by evil spirit who was sealed in this body.
description.0100: A long time ago some wizard decided that he will use Jack o' Lantern to create a sword. In the result another cursed weapon was created which is pretty popular.
description.0101: Book used by a Witches to use magic. Warriors successfully changed it into the weapon.
description.0102: Sharp icy item in the shape of cone. Some adventurers claim that eating it gives you temporary weapon. No one knows if they are seriousy or if the cold is making them crazy.
description.0103: It is created when water freezes. There are people who call themselves Ice Wizards. In reality they are just Water Wizards who can't control other states of water.
description.0104: Essence coming from Icy Slime. It has the same properties as the Blue Essence since Icy Slime is a variant of Blue Slime
description.0105: Snow you either love it or hate it. When it appears outside people know that Winter Festival is coming soon, which is happening every year.
description.0106: Cookie made specifically for Christmas. Kids love to eat it.
description.0107: Candy in a shape of cane which is made specifically for Christmas. Everybody loves sugar.
description.0108: Long orange vegetable. Supposedly improves eyesight, but after eating a lot of them I still need to wear my glasses.
description.0109: Present given under the christmas tree for adventurers. Always the same one in the same green packaging.
description.0110: Present given under the christmas tree for miners to sweeten their lifes. Every miner spends Christmas with thier family.
description.0111: Present given under the christmas tree for warriors. Many of the warriors spend Christmas away from home protecting villages.
description.0112: Decoration which can be found in the house of every miner. They love to flex with their work.
description.0113: Weapon as cool as its name. Snowy blade perfectly cuts through enemies. How did they force snow to work like that..?
description.0114: Elegant dagger made out of Ice. While holding it you don't feel its cold. Creating a dagger like that required great craftsmanship.
description.0115: Fragile crystal Orb which unlocks access to Winter Glade. It is said that Glade looks most beautiful during winter.
description.0116: Plant which often grows on old walls. It is hard to remove, because of its sharp thorns.
description.0118: Common egg laid by chickens. Important ingredient of many doughs.
description.0119:
Green egg, which can be found in the Forest during Easter. Many people were wondering how they are appearning there. Wizards were telling it is because of some magic properties of the trees. Some of the smartest people were saying that eggs come from animals and that their green color is coming from the polluted water. People who live there are saying that every year they are put there by the Gregory the Old.
They never came to consensus.
description.0120: Blue egg which can be only found in Green Eggs. Why there is another egg in an egg???
description.0121: Pink egg which could be gotten from Pink Bunny Slimes. Currently it is impossible to obtain them this way, because this type of slime is now extinct. They are used as a reward for quests. Different mystery is that how they are getting so many of these eggs.
description.0122: Egg made out of gold which can be found in different ruins. Another piece of evidence that people who were living on these terrains really liked weird decorations made out of gold.
description.0123: Basket containing items which every family is buying for Easter. Its price really increases which the coming of the Easter. Person who saw that convinced people to buy this item earlier to get it cheaper. This resulted in massive increase of price of this item during Winter Festival.
description.0124: Sausage made from natural meat. Its rich flavor can't be replicated with artificial alternatives crafted by Wizards and cheap sausages from Semerian Empire.
description.0125: Cupcake which everyone has eaten at least once while visiting their grandma. It can be found in equipment of warrior who cannot afford the potions.
description.0126: Sculpture made out from chocolate in the shape of bunny. Expensive snack bought only for Easter.
description.0127: Great Witch Arella joined Vines with Life Spellbook. In the result Spellbook was created which had damage from the thorns and healing from Life Spellbook. Unfortunately with her death the knownledge how to use full potential of this Spellbook has vanished.
description.0128:
Spellbook created as a joke. Really.
Fights where it is used are really annoying. For both sides. You shouldn't use it if you eggspect to have a real fight.
description.0131: Purple Shard that got its name from the fact that it is only found near places with a lot of spiders. It is wanted by many because of its durability.
description.a000: No one should see this, but if you managed to see this congratulations. By the way the guy who makes the item descriptions is called Braav. Do whatever you like with this information.

powersdescription.0034: Powerful attack that takes HP from enemy and gives it to the user.

notecontent.0064:
Na początku nie było nic.
Istniała jedynie istota nazwana przez uczonych Przeznaczeniem. Dzięki własnej woli stworzyła wielki i piękny świat, który był jej posłuszny. Po jakimś czasie zobaczyła, że zarządzanie całym światem jest bardzo wymagającym zajęciem, więc aby siebie odciążyć stworzyła bogów, którzy mieli strzec różnych elementów tego świata. Jednak niedługo po stworzeniu część bogów obróciła się przeciwko stwórcy. Rozpoczęła się wielka wojna. Wielu bogów zginęło oraz duża część ziemi została zniszczona. Przeznaczenie i część posłusznych jej bogów zwyciężyli w konflikcie, lecz wojny na ziemi nie ustały. Ludzie walczyli ze sobą obwiniając swoich wrogów za gniew bogów. Przeznaczenie, żeby zażegnać konfliktom, rozkazała bogom by stworzyli Opiekunów - ludzi, których zadaniem było przewodzenie ludzkości dobrą drogą. Opiekunowie, po stworzeniu, szybko zakończyli wszystkie konflikty i pozakładali państwa na terenach zajętych przez nich. Nastąpił pokój, lecz Przeznaczenie musiało odejść. Przed swoim odejściem przekazała bogom władzę nad światem i odeszła do krain jeszcze nie odkrytych.

KU CHWALE **JEJ**

changelogs.2.0.0:
Rewritten the bot to support slash commands.
Changed the name and avatar of the bot

Added **/hunt** command `prototype`
changelogs.2.0.1:
Added new drops for Golden Slime and Morex.
Added command **/use** thanks to it you can use some items.
Added Common Box as reward from **/beg**
changelogs.2.0.2:
Added four new commands: **/rate**, **/trade for_coins**, **/trade for_items**, **/give item**.
Easter Trophy 2023 is not longer in the shop. Pickaxe was added to the shop.
changelogs.2.0.3:
Added two new commands:
- **/dig** - Requires Pickaxe. You can get iron ore, coal, sand, earth and stone
- **/smelt** = Requires Furnace(in the shop for 2500 coins). Uses Coal to smelt ores to the materials.
changelogs.2.0.4:
Added commands:
- /bug_report

Reworked commands: /hunt:
- Added shield which you can rise up to 3 times during the fight
- Added Super Attack (available only for spellbooks)
- Added Spellbooks

New attribute for tools `cursed`. Cursed weapons have 40% chance of losing a battle with every use.

New items:
- Stone Sword
- Iron Sword
- Diamond Sword
- <:MX_TestSpellbook:1132424214973001728> Test Spellbook
- <:MX_DeathSpellbook:1133016270158188544> Death Spellbook (cursed)
- <:MX_LifeSpellbook:1133016233881640981> Life Spellbook

Currently you can only get <:MX_LifeSpellbook:1133016233881640981> Life Spellbook (special reward on /beg)

Updated slime textures:
<:MX_GreenSlime:1128635705304830073><:MX_BlueSlime:1128635752801116191><:MX_PinkSlime:1128635907998765116><:MX_YellowSlime:1130997302404853872><:MX_Morex:1123906643948736532>
changelogs.2.0.4.3:
Added commands:
- /event info

Updated items textures:

Bugfixes:
- MX_ERR230712.002
- MX_ERR230712.003
changelogs.2.0.4.4:

Added leveling system.

- Birthday Spellbook

changelogs.2.0.4.5:
Added commands:
- /craft
- /recipes

Added crafting system:
- To use /craft command you need <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Workbench
- Every recipe requires 1 <:MX_Hammer:1040924140141547611> Hammer
- /recipes commands gives informations about item's recipe

New items:
- <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Gold Ore
- <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Gold
- <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Diamond Ore
- <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Diamond
- <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Workbench

Changed ID of <:MX_Placeholder:1133387132766003210> Furnace:
ahh1 -> i001
changelogs.2.0.4.6:
Reworked commands:
- /item
- /recipes

Added two new types of Containers:
- Bundles
- Boxes
changelogs.2.1.0:
**Added commands:**
- /search
- /set_default
- /credits
- /equipment
- /redeem
**Other changes:**
- Bugfixes
- Updated commands
- Updated fighting system
- Updated smelting system
- Added searching system
- Many smaller changes.
- Bugfixes.
- Added many items

**Information:**
The update is too big, so I couldn't finish it. I decided to delay part of the features to updates from 2.1.1 to 2.1.5. I'll try to do them as fast as possible
kolpa01
changelogs.2.1.1:
**Added commands:**
- /fight

Added fights with other users. They work almost identical to the system from /hunt. Both systems will be unified in the next update.

**Bugfixes:**
- Only the amount of XP was visible after smelting was visible without any clear informations about what is it for.
- Replaced warning message after choosing wrong fuel in /smelt
- People on /leaderboards were displayed as Denis
- Message of death when user didn't have any SH said that they lost all SH and HP.
changelogs.2.1.1.2:
**New features:**
- Added player icons

**Bugfixes:**
- Incorrect names were displayed in /fight.
- User mention was still visible after accepting the fight
- Starting fight displayed incorrect look of SH

changelogs.2.1.4:
Slightly updated commands
A few recipes are unavailable
Bugfixes
changelogs.2.1.5: Added everything related to the first part of Halloween event.
changelogs.2.1.5.2:
Added new weapons
Updated Enlenna's shop
Bugfixes
changelogs.2.1.5.4: Spooky Forest and Scary Mineshaft are no longer available.
changelogs.2.2.0:
**Added commands:**
- /skills view
- /skills change
- /slots
**Other changes:**
- Updated all commands
- Transtaled the bot to english and added ability to use different languages
- Added couple of new quests
- Added new merchant in the forest
- Added Cave to /search
- Added ability to edit Custom Mobs
- New items
- New recipes
- Updated a few textures
- Battle saves are now on version 1
- Bugfixes
changelogs.2.2.1:
**Added command:**
- /christmas daily
**Other changes:**
- New event related locations
- New christmas and winter themed items
- Bugfixes
changelogs.2.2.4:
**Updated commands:**
- /quests
- /changelog
**Other changes:**
- Added Winter Glade on /search
- Bugfixes
changelogs.2.2.5:
**Updated commands:**
- /dig
- /search
**Other changes:**
- Added Overgrown Mineshaft to /dig
- Updated daily quests
- Added items related to Easter event
- Bugfixes
changelogs.2.2.5.2:
**Updated commands:**
- /inventory
**Other changes:**
- Easter event has ended

- /slots
- /smelt
- /trade for_coins
- /trade for_item
**Removed command:**

**Other changes:**
- Added Event system
- Updated daily quests
- Updated Pit on /dig
- Updated textures
- Added items
- Bugfixes

meetup.m018:
{e} swings gently your way.
You are filled with dread.

failedmobattack.m018: {e} stays in one place. The attack hasn't been made.

bshandhpmobattack.default: {e} attacks {u}. {u} loses all SH and {ahp} HP.

{e} seems disappointed.
